Caption: Marked that target with a Narc.
Name: Marked Target With Narc 1

Caption: Lighting up that hostile with TAG.
Name: Marked Target With Tag 1

Caption: Heh, Narc makes this too easy.
Name: Firing At Target Marked With Narc 1
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Firing At Target Marked With Narc 1.wav

Caption: Firing on Narc!
Name: Firing At Target Marked With Narc 2
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Firing At Target Marked With Narc 2.wav

Caption: Missile lock on Narc'd target!
Name: Firing At Target Marked With Narc 3
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Firing At Target Marked With Narc 3.wav

Caption: Narc'd target engaged!
Name: Firing At Target Marked With Narc 4
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Firing At Target Marked With Narc 4.wav

Caption: Firing on the lit target!
Name: Firing At Target Marked With Tag 1
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Firing At Target Marked With Tag 1.wav

Caption: Lased target acquired, firing!
Name: Firing At Target Marked With Tag 2
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Firing At Target Marked With Tag 2.wav

Caption: Weapons on lased target!
Name: Firing At Target Marked With Tag 3
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Firing At Target Marked With Tag 3.wav

Caption: TAG observed, engaging!
Name: Firing At Target Marked With Tag 4

Caption: Cold. Reminds me a bit of Lothario
Name: Biome Arctic 1

Caption: I suppose most people would find this pretty cold. I rather find it peaceful.
Name: Biome Arctic 2

Caption: It's cold, but not much wildlife here. Scratch this planet off the list I suppose.
Name: Biome Arctic 3

Caption: Snow almost looks pristine. Almost feels like we're tainting it with our battle here.
Name: Biome Arctic 4

Caption: This place is freezing, even for me.
Name: Biome Arctic Glacial 1

Caption: Damn, can feel the chill in the air from here. Reminds me of blizzards back on Lothario
Name: Biome Arctic Glacial 2

Caption: Any colder and the sensors will start acting up. Than we'll be down to just our eyes to spot targets.
Name: Biome Arctic Glacial 3

Caption: Commander, just because the 'Mechs are operational in these conditions, doesn't make it comfortable. Let's make this quick.
Name: Biome Arctic Glacial 4

Caption: Nothing here but dust and tumbleweeds.
Name: Biome Canyon 1

Caption: Dust, dust, and more dust. My eyes are blurring this place is so boring.
Name: Biome Canyon 2

Caption: Great, more dust. Wish I had a drink.
Name: Biome Canyon 3

Caption: This must be the most boring place to have a fight I've ever seen.
Name: Biome Canyon 4

Caption: How the hell does anything grow in a place like this?
Name: Biome Canyon Lush 1

Caption: Easy to get lost in this damn canyon. Keep an eye on your Battlemap.
Name: Biome Canyon Lush 2

Caption: Those flat tops will make excellent firing positions. Eyes up.
Name: Biome Canyon Lush 3

Caption: Commander, I recommend we avoid the obvious killbox as much as possible
Name: Biome Canyon Lush 4

Caption: This place looks familiar. I probably fought here before.
Name: Biome Earthlike

Caption: Any bets on how long Fahad's gonna complain about sand in the actuators?
Name: Biome Earthlike Desert

Caption: Forest, trees, wildlife...I'll have to remember this place.
Name: Biome Forest 1

Caption: Damn shame we're about to wreck this place.
Name: Biome Forest 2

Caption: If you're staring at the forest, you could at least check for Light 'Mechs hiding in it.
Name: Biome Forest 3

Caption: Glad I'm not the one who has to pick wood scraps out of the leg actuators.
Name: Biome Forest 4

Caption: It's fall here. Good huntin' times now.
Name: Biome Forest Autumn 1

Caption: Winter is coming. Gonna be out of time to hunt soon.
Name: Biome Forest Autumn 3

Caption: Staring at the view is a perfect way to get shot by the enemy.
Name: Biome Forest Autumn 4

Caption: Looks like it's getting hot. At least they have some shade.
Name: Biome Forest Summer 1

Caption: Reminds me of the place I retired to. Just hotter.
Name: Biome Forest Summer 2

Caption: If I die, at least I died in a place like this.
Name: Biome Forest Summer 3

Caption: Lots of cover...lots of places to hide.
Name: Biome Forest Summer 4

Caption: On Lothario, this would've been a hot day.
Name: Biome Forest Winter 1

Caption: This fresh snow could give us fresh 'Mech tracks to follow.
Name: Biome Forest Winter 2

Caption: All this snow makes me want to set up traps.
Name: Biome Forest Winter 3

Caption: Pure white snow. Should make our targets stand out by comparison.
Name: Biome Forest Winter 4

Caption: I know I complained about the glacial planets, but I think I'd rather be back there now.
Name: Biome Hostile 1

Caption: Open ground, clear sightlines...this should be a fun place to fight.
Name: Biome Hostile 2

Caption: Doesn't look like there's many life signs around. Good, less sensor clutter.
Name: Biome Hostile 3

Caption: I find it hard to believe that humans can actually live in places like this.
Name: Biome Hostile 4

Caption: The lack of noise is grating.
Name: Biome Hostile Moon 1

Caption: This low atmosphere is really messing up my reactions.
Name: Biome Hostile Moon 2

Caption: This has to be the worst battlefield I've ever been on.
Name: Biome Hostile Sulfurous 1

Caption: Didn't Fahad say something about acid totally trashing our 'Mechs?
Name: Biome Hostile Sulfurous 2

Caption: Are our enemies actively trying to find the worst places to fight?
Name: Biome Hostile Volcanic

Caption: Well, this should be a simple op.
Name: Mission Intro 2

Caption: Check your sightlines and stay sharp.
Name: Mission Intro 3

Caption: All systems online, let's go hunt them down Commander.
Name: Mission Intro 5

Caption: R.O.E? Tch, I believe that's up to us, Commander.
Name: Mission Intro 6

Caption: Glad to be aboard, Commander. You won't regret this.
Name: Pilot Hired

Caption: I just need a 'Mech and a target, Commander.
Name: Pilot Intro

Caption: Unable to complete that order, Commander.
Name: Command Negative 2

Caption: That's a no go, invalid routing.
Name: Command Negative Move 7

Caption: Damn it, no! Shit, shit, shit!
Name: Died Pilot

Caption: Curses, my 'Mech's gone crtical, I need to eject!
Name: Died Unit Critical

Caption: Damn them, they took down a friendly!
Name: Died Unit Lance 3

Caption: It's down to just the two of us, Commander.
Name: Died Unit Lance Last Lancemate Standing 1
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Died Unit Lance Last Lancemate Standing 1.wav

Caption: Just you and me left, Commander.
Name: Died Unit Lance Last Lancemate Standing 2
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Died Unit Lance Last Lancemate Standing 2.wav

Caption: Two of us left, take point and I'll cover.
Name: Died Unit Lance Last Lancemate Standing 3
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Died Unit Lance Last Lancemate Standing 3.wav

Caption: Weapons wiped, I need to eject.
Name: Ejected Helpless 1

Caption: My 'Mech's dead, I need to eject.
Name: Ejected Helpless 3

Caption: Another hit and I'm dead. I need to punch out.
Name: Ejected Scared 1

Caption: Reactor containment failure! Damn it, ejecting.
Name: Ejected Scared 3

Caption: Add another one to the pile.
Name: Kill Blow Mech Cheer 4

Caption: That kill's reactor is about to go.
Name: Kill Blow Mech Critical Cheer 2

Caption: Clear that splashed target, it's about to go critical.
Name: Kill Blow Mech Critical Cheer 3

Caption: Nice one, though you coulda left some salvage for us.
Name: Kill Blow Mech Critical Congrats

Caption: Commander, you gonna leave any salvage for later?
Name: Kill Blow Mech Critical Congrats Commander
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Kill Blow Mech Critical Congrats Commander.wav

Caption: Nice shot, right in the head.
Name: Kill Blow Mech Head Congrats 1

Caption: Headshot. Lot's of salvage left on that one.
Name: Kill Blow Mech Head Congrats 2

Caption: Argh. Heavy hit, lost a component!
Name: Take Damage Destroy Component 1

Caption: Armor at critical levels, lost a component!
Name: Take Damage Destroy Component 2

Caption: I can't sustain damage like this much longer!
Name: Take Damage Destroy Component 4

Caption: Can't keep this up, I'm being torn to scrap here!
Name: Take Damage Destroy Component 6

Caption: I'm being torn apart! Damage critical!
Name: Take Damage Destroy Component 7

Caption: Mayday! Component lost! Need support here!
Name: Take Damage Destroy Component 8

Caption: My left leg's gone! I'm hobbled!
Name: Take Damage Destroy Component LLeg

Caption: Right leg disabled, I'm stuck at slow speed!
Name: Take Damage Destroy Component RLeg

Caption: Watch that stray fire!
Name: Take Damage Unit Friendly Fire Commander 1
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Take Damage Unit Friendly Fire Commander 1.wav

Caption: Stay in your lane, I just took a hit from you!
Name: Take Damage Unit Friendly Fire Commander 2
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Take Damage Unit Friendly Fire Commander 2.wav

Caption: Check your fire!
Name: Take Damage Unit Friendly Fire Commander 3
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Take Damage Unit Friendly Fire Commander 3.wav

Caption: Blue on blue! Check your damn target!
Name: Take Damage Unit Friendly Fire Commander 4
SourcePath: pilot/Adder/Take Damage Unit Friendly Fire Commander 4.wav
